topic.title: VPN Server
topic.shortdesc: Release notes for VPN Server on Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX.

ul.li: Fixed the issue of Static Routes: After the PBX or the VPN Server restarted, the manually added static routes of OpenVPN would be lost.
Updated Russian and Italian web interface.
Optimized the message prompt of port conflicts.
Compatible with S-Series VoIP PBX v30.7.0.27.

body.section:
Version 1.0.13Released Date: July 13, 2017
Added support for German Web interface.
Updated Italian Web interface.

ul.li: Added support for assigning IP addresses for VPN clients.
Added support for assigning IP addresses for VPN clients.

body.section:
Version 1.0.6Released Date: January 4, 2017
Added support for Portugues and Serbia web interface languages.
Updated English, Chinese Simplified and Spanish web interface languages.
